admin.title: Complete Admin Dashboard
admin.subtitle: Full-featured CMS and administrative control center powered by Directus

opensource.title: Community Edition
opensource.description: The complete SynthStack core is source-available under the Community License (modified MIT, non-commercial). Great for learning, side projects, and evaluation.
opensource.note: AI Co-Founders is a premium add-on that supercharges your SynthStack with 6 specialized AI agents.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SynthStack

free.question: Is SynthStack really free?
free.answer: Yes! The Community Edition is free for learning, personal projects, and evaluation under the Community License (modified MIT, non-commercial). For commercial production use, purchase a Commercial License.

included.question: What's included in the Community Edition?
included.answer: Everything you need to build and self-host a SaaS: Vue 3 + Quasar UI, Fastify API, Directus CMS, Supabase auth, Stripe billing, blog, newsletter, analytics, theming, and cross-platform builds.

referral.question: How does the referral program work?
referral.answer: Share your unique link, earn rewards when friends sign up and purchase. Unlock tiered rewards: discount codes, credits, free months, up to 50% lifetime discount at the Elite tier.

aiDifference.question: What makes AI Co-Founders different?
aiDifference.answer: They're specialized agents with RAG context (they know your docs, code, CMS). They take real actions like creating PRs and blog posts. All actions require your approval first.

customAgents.question: Can I create custom AI agents?
customAgents.answer: Absolutely! Create your own specialized agents directly in Directus CMS - no coding required. Define custom prompts, personalities, icons, and capabilities. New agents appear instantly in your app.

apiKeys.question: Can I use my own AI API keys?
apiKeys.answer: Yes! SynthStack supports OpenAI and Anthropic APIs with your own keys. You control costs and have full visibility into usage. No vendor lock-in.

subscription.question: Is there a subscription option?
subscription.answer: We offer both lifetime ($297 one-time) and monthly subscription plans. Test mode lets you try everything with $0 charges. Enterprise teams can contact us for custom pricing.

byok.question: What is BYOK (Bring Your Own Keys)?
byok.answer: BYOK allows Premium and Lifetime users to use their own API keys from OpenAI and Anthropic instead of consuming SynthStack credits. This can save money at scale, bypass rate limits, and provide unlimited AI usage. Your keys are encrypted and stored securely.

cta.title: Ready to build your next project?
cta.subtitle: Full-stack SaaS boilerplate with AI superpowers. Ship 10x faster.
cta.note: Community License core · Pro: $297 lifetime · Referral rewards available

stlAnalysis.title: Smart STL Analysis
stlAnalysis.description: Our AI examines your model's geometry, detecting overhangs, thin walls, and optimal print orientations.

aiSettings.title: AI-Generated Settings
aiSettings.description: Get optimized parameters based on your specific printer, filament, and model characteristics.

multiSlicer.title: Export Anywhere
multiSlicer.description: Download ready-to-use profiles for OrcaSlicer, PrusaSlicer, Cura, and more.

community.title: Community Validated
community.description: Share profiles, see success rates, and build on what works.

featuresGrid.title: Full-Stack SaaS Features
featuresGrid.subtitle: Production-ready components out of the box. Build faster, ship sooner.

workflows.title: Visual Workflows
workflows.description: Build automations with drag-and-drop. LangGraph-powered DAGs execute AI agents, webhooks, and integrations in real-time.

aiAgents.title: AI Co-Founders
aiAgents.description: Create specialized AI agents in minutes. Edit prompts, personality, and capabilities through the admin panel - no code required.

webSearch.title: Live Web Research
webSearch.description: Agents search the web in real-time. Get current prices, news, competitor data - not stale training data.

orchestration.title: Multi-Agent Orchestration
orchestration.description: Agents delegate tasks to each other. Developer asks Researcher for context, Marketer asks SEO for keywords.

auth.title: Flexible Authentication
auth.description: Choose between Supabase (managed) or Local PostgreSQL (self-hosted). Both support OAuth, JWT, and RBAC.

selfHosted.title: Self-Hosted Auth Option
selfHosted.description: Run without external dependencies using Local PostgreSQL Auth. Argon2id hashing, session management, and full data sovereignty.

stripe.title: Stripe Billing
stripe.description: Subscriptions and one-time payments. Customer portal, invoices, webhooks, and test mode built-in.

directus.title: Directus CMS
directus.description: Full admin panel with visual editing, real-time collaboration, versioning, and live preview built-in.

visualEditing.title: Visual In-Place Editing
visualEditing.description: Edit content directly on your website. No switching between admin panel and preview - see changes in context.

collaboration.title: Real-Time Collaboration
collaboration.description: Work together seamlessly with smart field locking. See who's editing what with conflict-free collaboration.

versioning.title: Content Versioning
versioning.description: Track all changes with automatic versioning. Restore previous versions with a single click.

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Track user engagement, page views, and custom events. Built-in charts and export to CSV.

newsletter.title: Newsletter & Email
newsletter.description: Subscriber management, template builder, and campaign tracking. Resend or SMTP integration.

blog.title: Blog Platform
blog.description: Full-featured blog with categories, tags, SEO metadata, and markdown editor in Directus.

seoAudit.title: SEO Audit & Optimization
seoAudit.description: AI-powered SEO audits with keyword research, content scoring, and optimization suggestions. Lighthouse CI integration for automated performance tracking.

theming.title: Premium Theming System
theming.description: 10 built-in presets with 30+ light/dark combinations. 60+ CSS variables for complete customization. Real-time switching with database persistence.

referral.title: Referral System
referral.description: Seasonal campaigns, tiered rewards, discount codes, and leaderboards. Fully configurable.

integrations.title: 15+ Integrations
integrations.description: Connect Slack, Discord, GitHub, Notion, Google Sheets, Twilio, Jira, and more. BYOK supported.

knowledgeBase.title: RAG Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.description: Ingest documents from Drive, Notion, or URLs. Vector embeddings power AI agent context.

threeD.title: Complex Workflows in 3D
threeD.subtitle: Visualize intricate multi-step workflows with our interactive 3D graph engine

theming.badge: Best-Looking Quasar UX on the Web
theming.subtitle: Full Theming & Customization Built-In

howItWorks.q: How does the referral program work?
howItWorks.a: Share your unique referral link with friends. When they sign up and make purchases, you earn rewards based on your referral tier. The more people you refer, the better rewards you unlock!

getCode.q: How do I get my referral code?
getCode.a: Your referral code is automatically generated when you visit the referral dashboard. You can find it at the top of this page along with your shareable link.

whenCredit.q: When do I get credit for a referral?
whenCredit.a: You receive credit when someone signs up using your link and verifies their email address. The signup must occur within 30 days of clicking your link.

rewardTypes.q: What types of rewards can I earn?
rewardTypes.a:
Rewards include:
  • Discount codes - Percentage off purchases
  • Credits - Use for AI features
  • Free months - Subscription credit
  • Tier upgrades - Premium access

claimRewards.q: How do I claim my rewards?
claimRewards.a: When you unlock a reward tier, it appears in the Rewards section of your dashboard. Click Claim to receive your reward. Credits are added instantly; discount codes are generated for you to use.

expiration.a: Credits never expire. Discount codes may have expiration dates or usage limits - check the specific terms when you claim them.

selfReferral.a: No, self-referrals are not allowed. Using your own referral code to create another account violates our terms of service.

trackProgress.q: How can I track my referral progress?
trackProgress.a: Your dashboard shows real-time stats including clicks, signups, pending referrals, and your progress toward the next reward tier.

discountCodes.a: Discount codes are applied at checkout. Enter the code in the discount field to receive your percentage off. Each code has specific terms (usage limits, applicable products).

creditsVsDiscounts.q: What's the difference between credits and discounts?
creditsVsDiscounts.a: Credits are platform currency used for AI generations and workflow executions. Discount codes reduce the price of purchases and subscriptions.

page.title: Workflows
page.subtitle: Automate your business with visual workflows

welcome.title: Welcome to Workflows!
welcome.description: Build powerful automations visually - no coding required. Connect AI agents, external services, and your data.
welcome.aiAgentsDesc: Invoke AI co-founders to analyze, plan, and generate
welcome.integrationsDesc: Connect Slack, Google, Stripe, and more

nodes.title: Understanding Nodes
nodes.description: Workflows are built from nodes connected by wires. Each node has a specific function.
nodes.inputDesc: Start your flow - triggers, webhooks, schedules
nodes.processDesc: Transform data - functions, AI agents, logic

firstFlow.title: Your First Flow
firstFlow.description: Building a workflow is simple. Just drag, connect, and deploy!
firstFlow.step1Desc: Find nodes on the left sidebar and drag them onto the canvas
firstFlow.step2Desc: Click and drag from output ports to input ports
firstFlow.step3Desc: Double-click nodes to set their properties
firstFlow.step4Desc: Save and activate your workflow with the Deploy button
firstFlow.tip: Pro tip: Start with a template to learn faster!

integrations.title: Connect Your Integrations
integrations.description: Workflows become powerful when connected to your tools. Set up API keys to unlock all features.
integrations.note: You can add integrations later in Settings

templates.title: Workflow Templates
templates.noResultsDesc: Try adjusting your search or filters

quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.helpFromTemplate: Browse our library of pre-built templates. Each template is ready to use with minimal configuration.
quickActions.helpCreateBlank: Start with an empty canvas and build your workflow from scratch using nodes from the palette.
quickActions.helpOpenEditor: Launch the full Node-RED editor in a new tab to build and manage your workflows.

provider.title: API Provider
provider.description: Choose which AI provider's API keys you want to use. OpenAI for GPT models, Anthropic for Claude models. You can add keys for multiple providers.

rateLimits.title: Rate Limits Bypassed
rateLimits.description: When using BYOK, SynthStack's rate limits don't apply. You're only subject to your provider's limits, allowing for higher throughput and more requests.

usageStats.title: Usage Tracking
usageStats.description: BYOK usage is tracked separately from internal credits. View your API usage, token consumption, and estimated costs for each provider over the last 30 days.

fallback.title: Graceful Fallback
fallback.description: If your BYOK key fails or runs out of quota, the system automatically falls back to internal credits (if available). You'll be notified if this happens.

validation.title: Key Validation
validation.description: API keys are automatically validated when you save them. Valid keys are marked with a green chip. Invalid keys show an error message with details on how to fix the issue.

routingMode.title: Routing Mode
routingMode.description: The current routing mode determines whether BYOK or internal credits are used first. Admins can configure this system-wide: BYOK-First (default), Credit-First, or BYOK-Only.

creditSavings.title: Save Credits with BYOK
creditSavings.description: Using BYOK means you don't consume SynthStack credits for AI requests. At scale, this can save significant money by using provider direct pricing instead of credit-based billing.

keySource.title: Current Key Source
keySource.description: Shows whether your current requests are using BYOK (your own API keys) or internal credits (SynthStack's API keys). This helps you understand your current billing source.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: Your API keys are encrypted with AES-256 before being stored in the database. Keys are only decrypted in-memory when making API calls. We never log or expose your full keys.

costEstimation.title: Cost Estimation
costEstimation.description: Estimated costs are based on public provider pricing and actual token usage. Check your provider's invoice for exact costs, especially if you have custom pricing agreements.
